caseSummary: Customer reported multiple failed payment attempts on the mobile app and was charged a late fee despite the system showing a pending transaction. Customer is requesting reversal of fees and urgent correction to avoid service interruption.
Customer expressed frustration about unclear refund timelines for a disputed charge and asked when provisional credit would appear. Agent explained process but customer requests escalation.
Customer reported that an agent read full card digits aloud during the call; customer concerned about data exposure and requests incident review.
Customer called to update account details but agent did not request required ID verification; customer worried about unauthorized changes.
Customer praised support for quick resolution of a billing confusion; no follow-up required.
